alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:18PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Franklin and southern Bear Lake Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 418 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Saint Charles, or near Bear Lake Idaho Portion, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bear Lake Idaho Portion, Saint Charles, Dingle, Minnetonka Cave, Border Summit, Fish Haven, and Pegram. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range
